bike.description: Specialized FACT 7r carbon, triple monocoque construction, Designs for Women compact design, Zertz inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, alloy 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4-position adjustable
Specialized Zertz Women's Pro, 2014 alloy, short-reach drop, ergonomic shaping, 31.8
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/ 2.5mm gel padding
Specialized All Condition Pro, 700x23c, aramid bead, 120TPI w/ Flak Jacket
Specialized All Condition Pro, 700x23c, aramid bead, 120TPI w/ Flak Jacket
Specialized Jett Women's, carbon reinforced base, hollow Cr-Mo rails, microfiber cover
Specialized Pav√© FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
